name: Color Flip 3D
description:
Are you up for a challenge?

Flip and change all the blocks color into a single color by using the given moves!
Levels can sometimes look simple but you really have to think and try to find for the best solution.

Enjoy and have fun while watching the blocks being flipped! It's satisfying!

Features :
* Simple mechanism. Drag to flip colors
* Fun and relaxing designed handmade puzzle
* Easy to play but can be challenging too. Perfect for puzzle lovers!
* Lots of levels to entertain you for hours with many more coming soon!
